title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2103.5 - Repeat loans
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2103.5 - Repeat loans

State Regulations

Borrowers wishing to receive additional Lender of Last

Resort loans for subsequent academic periods will be required to complete the
entire LLR application process for each academic period for which they wish to
receive an LLR loan. LLR loans are subject to all of the restrictions and
limitations on both subsidized and unsubsidized Federal Stafford Loans found in

Federal law and regulations, including the maximum amounts
available. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2103.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
